item.title: Broken glass all over the concrete sports area, 5th July
item.description:
Broken glass all over the concrete area that used to be the former tennis courts. Very dangerous. This needs to be cleaned up immediately as many children use this area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willersley Avenue, Blackfen, London

item.title: Flytipped chair, 5th July
item.description:
Chair left by bench. Flytip happens regularly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Hill Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broadway market employee team who organised table top stools and packing away at end of day. I feel that I have been discriminated I am severely disabled and needed to park my car in the disabled bay which was free at the time but due to Broadway market team members using the disabled bay to store a table store in the designated bay. I had to sit in my disabled vehicle for 45 minutes and still no one came to remove the market table store. Then I had to relocate my vehicle struggling to find a spot to park., 5th July
item.description:
Broadway market organised team management discriminating disabled people by obstructing a disabled bay disgraceful and sickening. Someone from the authority can please address this issue seen as this is a regular occurrence.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Jackman Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, mattress and door dumped, 5th July
item.description:
Rubbish is dumped all across the pavement. The pavement is now blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 181,183, Walworth Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street cleaning, 5th July
item.description:
I live in a house where I pay full council tax. I now have to pay extra for garden waste collection, which used to be included. On top of that, the council has stopped cleaning the street, and it hasn’t been cleaned in over a month. It’s absolutely filthy

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kids with elime bikes dangerously riding on pavements Lydford close, 5th July
item.description:
Kids from No10 Lydford close dangerously riding hacked elime bikes on pavements, dumping them in the ground, riding 2on a bike with no control parents are aware & condone this behaviour
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lydford Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car left after owners moved away, 5th July
item.description:
The owners of this car have moved away and left this car. I’ve never seen it move, it’s dirty and has at least one flat tyre. I don’t think they are coming back for it. It’s taking up a parking space too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mountbatten Gardens, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped at the top of Tower Road to the entrance of Franks Park, 5th July
item.description:
Someone has dumped bags of rubbish outside the entrance to franks park which is at the top of Tower Road Belvedere DA176HX. There are old dirty nappies, plastic, rotting food which is attracting vermin but not only that, the plastic is blowing into residents front gardens and the green areas. This has been there for over 24 hours and is really horrible to live next to.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tower Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashburnham Retreat, London
Report on FixMyStreet
